column4: Ctrl - Alt - delete.... on windows brings up that task thing.... how do i set it up to do the smae on ubuntu?
Ctrl - Alt - delete.... on windows brings up that task thing.... how do i set it up to do the smae on ubuntu?
firestarter is not the firewall it's just a gui frontend,  the firewall is netfilter  ,  you can use iptable as a cli frontend
